channel.title: Can't connect to moparisthebest.com
channel.description: When i go to htp://www.moparisthebest.com this appears: [code]Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql.netfirms.com' (4) in /home/mopar/public_html/config.php on line 21 Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql.netfirms.com' (4)[/code] How can i connect?[br][size=1]Posted at: 13 August 2006, 09:40:31[/size][hr]Someone?

item.title: Can't connect to moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

ok, I fixed it, had to temporarily move the page but it works now

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

It’s apparantly an issue with the netfirms mysql server - I’m not sure exactly what the problem it, but its nothing you’re doing wrong (theres nothing you can do yourself to fix it).

Read full topic

item.title: Can't connect to moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Mopar Mod Mopar
item.description:
@Mod_Mopar wrote:

When i go to htp://www.moparisthebest.com this appears:

Warning: mysql_connect() [function.mysql-connect]: Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql.netfirms.com' (4) in /home/mopar/public_html/config.php on line 21 Can't connect to MySQL server on 'mysql.netfirms.com' (4)
How can i connect?[br][size=1]Posted at: 13 August 2006, 09:40:31[/size][hr]Someone?

Read full topic
